subject: Golf
PGA Championship
Officiating (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Whether it was sports talk radio, the Internet or the usual Monday morning conversations, everyone seemed to have an opinion about the Dustin Johnson penalty at the P.G.A. Championship.
snippet: Whether it was sports talk radio, the Internet or the usual Monday morning conversations, everyone seemed to have an opinion about the Dustin Johnson penalty at the P.G.A. Championship.
